overview: Eric Evans graduated from NSU with a Bachelors Degree in Business/Marketing. He has more than 18 years of inside/outside sales experience working with start-up to fortune 500 companies. Eric has held the title of Director/VP of Sales for more than half of his career including responsibilities such as national research and development, product implementation, business market analysis, consulting, hiring, training, and has established more than 30 successful offices in 16 different states from the ground up. He believes the key to any clientâ€™s success is through continuous education of offered products and services.
